attributes.action: Northern Ireland Referendum British Voters Only
attributes.additional_details: During this times of austerity and financial uncertainty can the British people continue to afford the costs of carying the open wound that is Northern Ireland. For far too long the British tax payers have suffered and wasted far too much good money that would be better spent on the loyal honest people of Britain and the savings could be used for Health and Education. We therefore call for a referendum of Northern Ireland leaving the United Kingdom and cutting all support and ties.
